Reviews.Title: “Nice hotel at great location”
Reviews.Author: YJScq
Reviews.Content: threestar hotel means lobby elevator tiny stairwell close key key card fashioned lever tumbler key location window arc de triomphe staff friendly spoke perfect english breakfast lovely price reasonable inroom wifi fast stable required registering home address email apparently legal reasons highly recommend astrid

Reviews.Title: “Top location and the room is adequate”
Reviews.Author: JasonNyilas
Reviews.Content: budget hotel heart paris location die unobstructed view arc de triomphe stick head bathroom window look avenue carnot leads champs elysees incredibly quiet paris standards restaurants neighbourhood parisienne priced themselves shout lift didnt staying top floor five flights narrow stairs lot fun bags required nights sleep beds tired didnt stay flat creaky time moved bathroom contrast appeared newly tiled refurbished breakfast food family runs hotel friendly quirky hotel charm thrown wouldnt stay wasnt value money

Reviews.Title: “Great value and location”

Reviews.Content: location staff helpful friendly fine little clean brilliant shower able access emails computer near entrance definitely stay promise wont minus 10 degrees paris im

Reviews.Title: “A really enjoyable stay”
Reviews.Author: croatiabuddy
Reviews.Content: hotel astrid situated ideal spot walking metro travel inexpensive restaurants bars quiet comfortable king size bed shower etc highly recommended breakfast excellent usual bread pastries cheese ham fruit salad etc wonderful plentiful coffee

Reviews.Title: “Good value and location”
Reviews.Author: weekendescapes
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel astrid 3 nights september 2011 recommend loaction value money airport caught air france bus departs terminal 30mins charles de 5 minute walk downhill hotel hotel quiet street excellent location arc de triomphe 5 minute walk main train lines city towards eiffel tower accessable lift stairs hotel building nice comfortable bed desk wardrobe sitting tablechairs window arc de bathroom clean included bath found staff friendly helpful spoke english free wifi breakfast hotel included continental buffet restaurants cafes walking distance grocer corner

Reviews.Title: “November stay 2011”
Reviews.Author: alex s
Reviews.Content: enjoyable stay bathroom impeccably clean relatively comfortable bed nice sit window watch people shower fantastic option bath staff friendly free breakfast bonus view arc de triomphe balcony window

Reviews.Title: “Location location location”
Reviews.Author: goforit52
Reviews.Content: husband spent 4 nights hotel astrid 6th floor top balcony liked bed king sized comfortable bathroom clean recently refurbished criticism frosted glass bathroom door prefer visible toilet dont stay close terms travelling companion breakfast super staff friendly helpful probably hotel location short walk hill charles de gaulle etoile metro rer street fan arc de triomphe quiet traffic wise

Reviews.Title: “Good Place to Be”
Reviews.Author: mfb
Reviews.Content: cosy hotel located hop skip jump arc de triomphe athletic type otherwise five minutes walk arc metro stop arc brasseries leaving hotel patisserie epicerie butcher tempted buy roast chicken beat cost restaurants bed requested nonsmokers didnt stink bathroom recently refurbished safe free wifi air conditioning adequately heated weekend happened unseasonably warm look probably seasonally warm global warming account breakfast decent yogurts cheeses ham coffee hot milk choose real juice types bread regular sized croissants pain chocolat usual oversized type neither sampled attest quality breakfast pleasant television thankfully played screen saver criticism id breakfast stylish chairs low tables stools tad butts course little butts aspires staff helpful clean breakfast personnel hard spoke english solid bed street noise window closed charming view street arc de triomphe hotels location plus walking distance walker otherwise metro close hand return

Reviews.Title: “Fantastic hotel in a great location”
Reviews.Author: Ronnie B
Reviews.Content: wife stayed 9 days france business picked hotel close metro lines wife hotel close shopping restaurants hotel met staff extremely friendly helpful free wifi breakfast clean comfortable highly recommend hotel visiting paris business fun

Reviews.Title: “Clean and comfy”
Reviews.Author: CarberyMan
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights october 1st nice little hotel near arch de triomphe modern decent size bathroom glad ac hot spell paris easy walk metro buses shopping staff friendly helpful complaint forgot tell breakfast included checkin

Reviews.Title: “great value close to main metro station”
Reviews.Author: britwit007
Reviews.Content: nice hotel near main metro station arc de triumph nice beds pillows comfy hotel staff friendly helpful closer airport taxi ride cost 40 euros airport dont bother shuttle buses cost taxi

Reviews.Title: “You must stay here - great hotel with espectacular location”
Reviews.Author: PatoyVicky
Reviews.Content: hotel reccomended friend excellent 3 blocks triumph arc 2 blocks metro station reception staff friendly europe standards hand bathroom compared tiny european hotels bathroom brand bathtub nice breakfast included breakfast areawith 56 tables nicest hotel confortable food variety tasty price compared similiar hotels charge included internet connection title review stay regret

Reviews.Title: “superb place to stay”
Reviews.Author: Pete_G0S
Reviews.Content: stayed romantic paris trip girlfriend loveley hotel staff friendly helpfull loaction nr transport links 1 min walk charles de gaulle – étoile bars resteraunts near def recommend yuppies café 13 rue paris 5 mins walk reasonably cheap beer local style bar letoile rue 2 mins walk

Reviews.Title: “Great Location, good value for money and great staff”
Reviews.Author: Terranovas
Reviews.Content: heard dreadful remarks hotels paris jump tripadvisor homework found hotel located close arc de triomphe metro rer line stay les cars bus service orly perfect 4 nights clean lcd tv french double bed hard mattress bathroom en suite shower clean avenue carnot quiet sleep window breakfast buffet style ham cheese croissants yoghurt simple fantastic walk survive paris late afternoon staff helpful friendly sadly elevator broken arrival staff frankly told difficult fixed eastern holidays 6 floors voucher free tour ships stay

Reviews.Title: “Charming and friendly”
Reviews.Author: dallasbc
Reviews.Content: location buffet breakfast outstanding lots bars block metro tight dated clean modern bath warm staff friendly carrying 4 flights elevator stay heartbeat

Reviews.Title: “Great Central Location, close to the famous landmarks of Paris”
Reviews.Author: helces
Reviews.Content: trip paris 19 yr daughter shared motherdaughter time price hotel included cruise seine reasons chose hotel am glad half block arc de triumph metro walked champs de crossed alexandre bridge magnifique breakfast included saved lot money clean comfortable twin beds bathroom internet air conditioned treat hot summer sightseeing days definitely recommend astrid hotel hope

Reviews.Title: “If not for the volcano...”
Reviews.Author: thefourwatsons
Reviews.Content: met friends paris france planes land charles de gaulle closed perfect boutique hotel charm hoped staying paris spacious european standards overlooked street view arc de triomphe stay astrid included river cruise suggestion hotel staff dusk breath hotel close train walking distance eiffel tower recommend trip basilique du sacre coeur dont mind heights hotel breakfast added bonus

Reviews.Title: “Good location, service and breakfast with friendly staff”
Reviews.Author: breezebythesea
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 3 nights late june hotel friend intend book beginning happy 3night stay location close arc de triomphe travelled cdg airport shuttle station 5 minutes walk hotel metro station environment lobby elegantly decorated paintings therere cafes nearby staff speaks english little french calmed helpful nice size ok washroom tv furniture condition clean breakfast nice variety food expected traditional continental breakfast value considering location service breakfast friendy staff hotel value

Reviews.Content: booked hotel travelzoo promotion free seine cruise offer guests staff desk bad woman terrific people staff breakfast cleaning staff nice breakfast light fare bread croissants cheese perfect 500 yards arc de triumph close champs de elysee metro stop closest charles de gaulle etoile walked restaurant larc attached building affiliated hotel eat drinks dessert pretty nice wine bar street nice expensive staff nice superior bathroom decent size rue de carnot somewhat loud especially weekends overall nice

Reviews.Title: “Nice Hotel”

Reviews.Content: nice hotel beds hard pillows flat clean traffic noise convenient location staff moderately friendly helpful otherwise didnt offer help directions etc lady particular business didnt offer extra advice breakfast plenty liked location near arc arc view window im stay

Reviews.Title: “Great location, free wifi, better than usual brakfast”
Reviews.Author: mr-ashenden
Reviews.Content: ive stayed hotel times price value paris pros location close arc de triomphe lots pubs cafes food stores store nearby free wifi access codes available lobby friendly helpful staff breakfast usual paris style continental cheeses ham salami fruit salad freshly pressed orange juice checkin available ready cons thats typical paris minibar blanket artificial kept waking sweating night english channel bbc definitely stay hotel astrid im business trip paris
